entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
